text: Here's how to post on Reddit
from your mobile device or computer.
Use the clickable sections below

to skip to different
parts of this tutorial.

Find the community or
subreddit you want to post in.
You can navigate there
by entering the URL Reddit.com/r/

and then put in the
subreddit name at the end
or by searching for the subreddit
by using the search box at the top.

If you've already subscribed
to a particular subreddit,

you can navigate there
via the drop-down menu
on Reddit's homepage.

Click "Create Post" near the
top of the subreddit's header.
Choose a title
and compose your post.
Click "Post" to submit.
Once signed in to the Reddit app,

navigate to the subreddit
where you'd like to post.

We're using the Reddit app
for Android in this video.
If you're subscribed to the subreddit,
tap this icon at the bottom.

Otherwise, search for the
subreddit in the top search bar.

Tap the plus icon at the
bottom center of the screen.

Tap the icon of the type of
content you want to include.
Create a title for your post

and write or attach
your multimedia content.

Finalize by tapping "Post"
in the top right corner.
